name: BESTOOL Jack Stands 4 ton, Jack Stand with Security Locking Pins 8,000 lbs Capacity, 2 Pack (Black)
short_description: BESTOOL jack stands boast a distinct design featuring circular base pads and a flat top rubber saddle, providing superior protection to your car frame compared to conventional curved axle post stands. These stands ensure maximum stability and safety, with removable and replaceable non-slip pads.
Our car jack stand is equipped with a mobility pin height adjustment mechanism that offers 7 adjustable positions, delivering flexibility and added security for all your lifting needs.

The rubber circular base pad is specifically designed to prevent paint scratches on your vehicle. The stand is finished with a powder coating to resist rust, and supports a load capacity of 4 tons (8,000 lbs), with a height range of 13.4 to 20 inches.

Constructed from high-grade forged steel, the 4-ton jack stands feature a welded frame design that ensures durability. The wide pyramid foot base enhances strength and provides stable support for your vehicle.
These jack stands are perfect for modern low ground clearance cars, catering to a variety of vehicles such as small cars, SUVs, light-duty trucks, jeeps, ATVs, UTVs, and more.

short_description: 【Excellent Performance】：Our car jack stand has a flexible range of 10-levels of adjustable height, a lifting range of 11.22" to 16.54" (285-420mm),The rigid steel construction ensures the jack stand is strong and corrosion-resistant. 【Double Safety Design】：Prioritizing safety during repairs, our car jack stands 3 Ton are designed with a dual safety mechanism, featuring a handle adjustment locking ratchet bar and a metal removable safety pin. The removable locking support pin provides additional security, increasing safety by 200%!

【Adjustable Ratchet Bar】: The multi-position ratchet bar is made of high-quality cast ductile iron, thickened and forged in one piece, which is durable and not easy to break. The ratchet bar adopts a serrated design, which can be easily and quickly adjusted to the required height and locked in place, allowing DIY enthusiasts or mechanics to maintain or repair cars safely and happily

【Durable Rubber Pads】：Our heavy duty jack stands all feature sturdy rubber pads to prevent damage or scratches to your car's chassis during use, and also help maintain a strong, stable support by protecting the stand's contact points. Simply place the rubber pads on top of the jack stand, and the part of the jack that contacts your car will no longer be scratched

【Superior Car Lifting Tool】: Each of our 3 Ton jack stands has been rigorously tested to ensure greater safety and reliability, and meets US safety standards. Great for home, garage, car, truck, farm and shop use. This exquisite car lifting tool is also a great choice as a gift for father and husband
